shortHelp.title: <prefix here>help pillars
shortHelp.text: use this command to know how to use pillar commands

shortHelp.title: <prefix here>help admin
shortHelp.text: use this command to know how to use admin commands

pillars.title: <prefix here>pillars
pillars.text: use this command to get a random pillar

pillars.title: <prefix here>pillars pillar <number here>
pillars.text: use this command to get the specified number in the pillars

pillars.title: <prefix here>pillars prefix <number here>
pillars.text: use this command to get the specified number in the pillars

pillars.title: <prefix here>setChannel <channel mention or id here>
pillars.text: use this command to set the channel for getting random pillars

admin.title: <prefix here>prefix <new prefix here>
admin.text: use this command to get the specified number in the pillar but for prefixes

admin.title: <prefix here>load <extension>
admin.text: use this command to load the extension

admin.title: <prefix here>unload <extension>
admin.text: use this command to unload the extension

admin.title: <prefix here>reload <extension>
admin.text: use this command to reload the extension
